text:
Created attachment 20697
bitmap8bits.wmf

bitmap8bits.wmf : test case (8 bit bitmap embedded in a WMF file).
Unfortunately, the bitmap is embedded in a META_STRETCHDIB function, so bug
#43194 must be fixed to be able to see something.

Created attachment 20698
bug43195.patch

bug43195.patch : fix for the bug
